item.title: Study Days with Red & White | April 25
item.description: Date: Friday, April 25, 2025 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM - Stressed about finals? Join the Red & White Student Organization for finals study days! There will be free food, tutors, and quiet places to study. The event will be held at the Heffner Alumni House (1301 People’s Avenue) on Friday and Saturday before finals week.
item.author: Students

item.title: James Fund Applications Now Open
item.description: Date: Wednesday, April 16, 2025 12:00 AM - Mon , April 28, 2025 12:00 AM - What: Join RPI’s student-managed investment fund to gain hands-on experience managing a six-figure portfolio, conducting investment research, and learning key finance concepts. Members benefit from a collaborative team environment and exclusive networking opportunities. Apply now! Who Should Apply: Students of any background interested in markets, finance, economics, or quantitative risk. Deadline: April 28th
item.author: Students

item.title: Rensselaer at Work hosts Analytics, Machine Learning & AI Review April 24
item.description: Date: Thursday, April 24, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., on a 30-minute information session highlighting Rensselaer online, project-based graduate certificate programs in Analytics, Machine Learning & AI. Expect to learn how data can inform better decisions and review an analytic method that can be used regardless of the tools at hand. Please register if you plan to attend.

item.title: Collegiate Store Offering 20% - 50% Off During Spring Art Sale
item.description: The Rensselaer Collegiate Store is currently hosting its Spring 2025 Art Sale from now through Saturday, June 28, 2025, with sale items available both in-store and online. While supplies last, customers can save 20% off select art supplies, 40% off select brushes, and 50% off paper and canvas! Note that this sale excludes clearance items, art kits, metals, and jewelry, and cannot be combined with other coupons or discounts.

item.description: Date: Friday, April 25, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM - Join the Wellness committee for Stress Relief Days and take a break from finals! Contact Emma Atkinson in the Mueller Center with any questions.

item.title: iEAR Presents! Heightened Scrutiny Film Screening and Q&A | April 23
item.description: Heightened Scrutiny is a documentary film about the first out trans attorney arguing in front of the US Supreme Court (United States v. Skrmetti) and the role of mainstream media in fueling anti-trans legislation. The film’s director, Sam Feder, will be presenting this film at the Sanctuary followed by a Q&A. Ahead of the film, Feder will be offering a Be The Media! workshop from 5-6pm.
item.author: Community

item.title: Celebrate the Future Generations of Game Designers at GameFest 2025
item.description: GameFest returns to the Tech Valley Center of Gravity in Downtown Troy on Saturday, April 26 from 1pm-7pm. GameFest is an annual showcase of student talent in game development, bringing together students from around New York State and the Northeast to exhibit their games. The GameFest awards recognize excellence in game design, technical innovation, artistic quality, and narrative design, and are awarded by a panel of expert judges from game studios in the Capital Region.
item.author: Community

item.title: Pulse DJ Night | April 23
item.description: Wednesday / April 23, 2025 at 7:00 pm The spring 2025 PULSE performance is an original DJ set comprised of original compositions and remixes created by Matthew Campbell, Jourdon Willett, and Olakiite Fatukasi, members of the PULSE crew. Set within the 360º screen in EMPAC’s Studio 2, the compositions are themed around synthesizing old and new media across platforms to create a familiar yet fresh sonic experience. Presented by PULSE Music/Sound Spring 2025
